14#include <config.h>
15
16#include <isc/util.h>
17#include <isc/types.h>
18
19#include "entropy_private.h"
20
21#include <openssl/rand.h>
22#include <openssl/err.h>
23
24void
25isc_entropy_get(void *buf, size_t buflen) {
26 if (RAND_bytes(buf, buflen) < 1) {
27 FATAL_ERROR(__FILE__,
28 __LINE__,
29 "RAND_bytes(): %s",
30 ERR_error_string(ERR_get_error(), NULL));
31 }
32}
